settings.name: raster file
settings.description: You can upload local files for running the resource selection function analysis. Make sure that they overlap with the tracking data set and are in WGS 84 projection! The App requires the following files, named exactly as given: 1. `raster.tif`. Note that fallback raster files of elevation, forest cover, Landcover and human modification are provided

settings.name: Whether the raster is categorical or not
settings.description: Specify if the raster used for the resource selction analysis is a cetegorical raster (Landuse-Landcover) or continuous

settings.name: Whether the resource selection analysis is done at a individual level or population level
settings.description: Specify if the resource selction analysis is done to be individualwise or for the population

settings.name: How many layers do the user uploaded raster has
settings.description: Specify if the raster uploaded by the user has a single layer or multiple layers
